title: EMP
description: In a flash of searing light, the world changed. When a catastrophic electromagnetic pulse (EMP) wipes out all modern technology, the small town of Kenton is thrust into a perilous struggle for survival. As chaos ensues, its residents must band together, navigate treacherous challenges, and battle their own inner demons. With their very existence hanging in the balance, will they discover the strength within themselves and forge an unbreakable community, or succumb to the harrowing aftermath of this harrowing disaster? EMP is an engrossing tale of resilience, camaraderie, and the unyielding human spirit in a world stripped of its very foundations.
author: Wilson Harp
